timeline.title: Nellai Thatibellam Tea
timeline.description: It all started with a cup of palm jaggery tea — Nellai Thatibellam chai. A simple, traditional drink that reminded people of home. That first sip became the foundation of Milletmillodies.

timeline.title: Millet Tiffin Dream
timeline.description: Why not bring the same village authenticity to breakfast? Millet batters, pure ghee, traditional podi — the idea of a healthy, Telangana-rooted tiffin experience was born.

timeline.title: Tiffin Bandi Opens
timeline.description: The first Milletmillodies stall opened, serving Addaku Idly and millet dosas. The leaf-served idly became an instant signature — eco-friendly and deeply traditional.

timeline.title: Catering & Community
timeline.description: Word spread through families and offices. Catering requests poured in — weddings, corporate breakfasts, pelli pandiri events. Milletmillodies became a trusted name for authentic Telangana breakfast.
